original_text: And Abimelech chased him, and he fled before him, and many were overthrown and wounded, even unto the entering of the gate.
korean_text: 아비멜렉이 그를 추격하니 그 앞에서 도망하였고 부상하여 엎드러진 자가 많아 성문 입구까지 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: and many were overthrown and wounded
even unto the entering of the gate
